feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2024-02-28T04:04:44.435978Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;机翼</stitle>; <id>;https://ciechanow.ski/airfoil/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T17:04:25.844079Z</更新>; <link href="https://ciechanow.ski/airfoil/"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti </uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ciechanow.ski/images/og/airfoil.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;本文探讨了飞行的物理原理，重点关注机翼形状和方向如何让飞机保持在空中。它还深入研究了使用箭头、标记和颜色等各种方法来可视化气流。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#airfoil" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 39526057" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;测试容器</stitle>; <id>;https://testcontainers.com/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-28T00:04:25.845995Z</更新>; <link href="https://testcontainers .com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;floriangosse</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=floriangosse</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://testcontainers.com/images/hero-illustration/laptop.svg" style="宽度：220px；高度：178px；" />;<br />;Testcontainers 提供一次性 Docker 容器实例进行测试，无需复杂的设置，确保测试环境一致。它支持多种语言，并拥有一个支持其发展的社区。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#testcontainers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <id>;https://speakz.ai</id>; <updated>;2024-02-27T22:04:25.847234 Z</updated>; <link href="https://speakz.ai"/>; <作者>; <name>;leobg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=leobg< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Speakz 是一款将视频配音成不同语言的工具，同时保留原始语音和声音，专为个人使用而创建，现在可以帮助创作者覆盖更广泛的受众。它可以快速处理翻译，支持多种语言，并且可以提供实惠的定价计划。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-ai-dub-tool-i-made-to-watch-foreign-language-videos-with-my-7-yearold" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39512912" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建非正统的深度学习 GPU 机器</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2024-02-neanderthals-usage-complex-adhesives-reveals.html</id>; <updated>;2024-02-28T00 :04:25.848023Z</updated>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2024-02-neanderthals-usage-complex-adhesives-reveals.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wglb< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b- cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2024/did-neanderthals-use-g-2.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;科学家发现尼安德特人使用复杂的粘合剂，这表明他们具有先进的认知能力。该研究揭示了早期智人与尼安德特人之间相似的思维模式。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #neanderthals-use-of-complex-adhesives-shows-high-cognitive-bility" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =39515087" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;JEP 467：Markdown 文档注释</stitle>; <id>;https://openjdk.org/jeps/467</id>; <更新>;2024-02-28T00:04:25.848417Z</更新>; < link href="https://openjdk.org/jeps/467"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cr.openjdk.org/~jjg/Object-hashcode-diff-3.png" style="width: 220px; height: 88px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了在 JavaDoc 注释中启用 Markdown 以简化 API 文档、保留 HTML 和 JavaDoc 标签以实现兼容性，以及扩展 Compiler Tree API 以用于分析文档中的 Markdown 工具。<a href="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/#jep-467-markdown-documentation-comments" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=39531600" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;云层在日食期间消失，我们知道原因</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sciencealert.com/clouds-vanish-during-a-solar-eclipse-and-we-finally -知道为什么</id>; <更新>;2024-02-28T01:04:25.848808Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sciencealert.com/clouds-vanish-during-a-solar- eclipse-and-we-finally-know-why"/>; <author>; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.sciencealert.com/images/2023/10/SolarEclipse-642x260.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 90px;" />;<br />;日食会导致浅层积云消散，其影响从 15% 的阳光覆盖率开始。这一发现引起了人们对遮挡阳光的气候工程对云行为和天气模式影响的担忧。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#clouds-vanish-during-a-solar-eclipse-and-we-know-why" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39510752" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国对 UnitedHealth 展开反垄断调查</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/health/healthcare/us-launches- antitrust-investigation-of-healthcare-giant-unitedhealth-ff5a00d2</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T22:04:25.849202Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/health /healthcare/us-launches-antitrust-investigation-of-healthcare-giant-unitedhealth-ff5a00d2"/>; <author>; <name>;moose_man</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =moose_man</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;请启用JS并禁用任何广告拦截器<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#us-opens-unitedhealth-antitrust-探测" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39530487" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;问 HN：谁还在直接在服务器上编程？< /stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39521773</id>; <更新>;2024-02-28T03:04:25.849596Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39521773"/>; <作者>; <名称>;asim</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=asim</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;本文讨论了在个人项目上部署代码的替代、更简单的方法，强调了“正确方法”的上下文性质及其对个人工作不必要的复杂性。它强调了此类方法的优点和缺点，包括协作的便利性以及互联网依赖性和 Linux 命令行熟练程度的潜在问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-who-is-still-programming-directly-on-a-server" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39521773" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;测试 F-35C Tailhook</stitle>; <id>;https://the-engi-nerd.github.io/posts/欢迎/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T16:04:25.849997Z</更新>; <link href="https://the-engi-nerd.github.io/posts/welcome/"/>; <作者>; <name>;sklargh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sklargh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://the-engi-nerd.github.io/posts/welcome/images/clipboard-270015806.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：140px；" />;<br />;本文叙述了作者在航母适用性测试期间处理 F-35C 尾钩设计问题的经验，重点介绍了最初的故障以及随后为有效接合拦阻索而进行的重新设计。它以涉及 F-35C 硬着陆和随后的程序审查的激烈测试事件结束。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#testing-the-f-35c-tailhook" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=39525243" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;苹果在经历了十年的冒险之后将逐步停止电动汽车业务</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-02-27/apple-取消-work-on-electric-car-shifts-team-to-generative-ai</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T19:04:25.850447Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-02-27/apple-cancels-work-on-electric-car-shifts-team-to-generative-ai"/>; <作者>; <名称>;coloneltcb </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=coloneltcb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.bwbx.io/images /users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/it.5KxtWk5Zw/v1/-1x-1.jpg" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：147 像素；" />;<br />;彭博社报道称，苹果公司暂停了长达十年的电动汽车项目，令大约 2,000 名参与其中的员工感到惊讶。该内部公告由首席运营官 Jeff Williams 和副总裁 Kevin Lynch 发布。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-to-wind-down-electric-car-effort-after-decadelong-odyssey" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39528134" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;德古拉最大的错误</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.ayjay.org/the-real-value-of-a -catholic-modernity/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T19:04:25.850836Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.ayjay.org/the-real-value-of-a -catholic-modernity/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;切斯特菲尔德</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=chesterfield</uri>; </作者>; <content type=" html">;查尔斯·泰勒的演讲“天主教现代性？”暗示了天主教在击败德古拉方面的作用，德古拉最终被教会的技术官僚现代性和精神技术的力量所压倒。德古拉的传统权力无法与现代行政程序和用来对付他的神圣物品相匹敌。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dracula-s-biggest-mistake" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=39512188" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;蚂蚁地缘政治</stitle>; <id>;https://aeon.co/essays/the-strange-and-turbulent-global-world-of-ant-geopolitics</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T14:04:25.851218Z</更新>; <link href="https://aeon.co/essays/the-strange-and-turbulent-global-world-of-ant-geopolitics"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;romaintailhurat</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=romaintailhurat</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://images.aeonmedia.co/user_image_upload/2864/insert-98657943-invicta51.jpg?width=3840&quality=75&format=auto” style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;来自中美洲和南美洲的一小群蚂蚁在全球范围内扩张，形成了庞大的社会，并通过与本地物种的竞争来影响生态系统。欧洲的勘探和贸易促进了它们的传播，并形成了基于化学识别的“匿名社会”。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ant-geopolitics" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=39523495" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;您需要的只是广泛事件，而不是“指标、日志和跟踪”</stitle>; <id>;https://isburmistrov.substack.com/p/all-you-need-is-wide-events -not-metrics</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T21:04:25.851598Z</更新>; <link href="https://isburmistrov.substack.com/p/all-you-need-is- Wide-events-not-metrics"/>; <作者>; <名称>;talboren</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=talboren</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#all-you-need-is-wide-events-not-metrics-logs-and-traces" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39529775" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;快时尚 Shein 的崛起，Temu 搅动全球航空货运业</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.japantimes.co.jp/business/2024/02/22/companies/fast-fashion-shein-temu-global-cargo/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T21:04:25.851975Z< /updated>; <link href="https://www.japantimes.co.jp/business/2024/02/22/companies/fast-fashion-shein-temu-global-cargo/"/>; <作者>; <姓名>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn4 .premiumread.com/?url=https://www.japantimes.co.jp/japantimes/uploads/images/2024/02/22/281943.jpg&w=1000&q=100&f=jpg&t=1.2" style="width: 220px ; height: 141px;" />;<br />;像 Shein 和 Temu 这样的快时尚电商正在扰乱全球航空货运，对快速配送的需求很高。他们每天运送数千个包裹，增加了空运成本并导致运力问题. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rise-of-fast-fashion-shein-temu-roils-global-air-cargo-industry" target="_blank">;[摘要]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39526147" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;多波长成像 - 模拟 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com /watch?v=nEjNbrydLKU</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T22:04:25.852372Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nEjNbrydLKU"/>; <作者>; <名称>;nothacking_</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nothacking_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src=" //www.youtube.com/embed/nEjNbrydLKU"frameborder="0"allowfullscreenloading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#image-formation-with- multiple-wavelengths-simulation-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39516465" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;任天堂正在起诉 Switch 的创作者模拟器 Yuzu</stitle>; <id>;https://overkill.wtf/nintendo-sue-yuzu-emulator/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T22:04:25.853125Z</更新>; <link href= "https://overkill.wtf/nintendo-sue-yuzu-emulator/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;brandrick</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=brandrick< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://overkill.wtf/content/images/2024/02/yuzu-switch-lawsuit.jpg" style="width: 220px ; height: 124px;" />;<br />;美国任天堂正在起诉 Yuzu 的创作者侵犯版权，声称该模拟器助长盗版。任天堂要求赔偿损失并关闭模拟器，因为它绕过了游戏的保护系统。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nintendo-is-suing-the-creators-of-switch-emulator-yuzu" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39530203" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SpaceX 在清除 FAA 障碍时披露了星舰异常的原因</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/space/2024/02/faa-closes -starship-inquiry-and-spacex-details-causes-of-november-accidents/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T13:04:25.853506Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica .com/space/2024/02/faa-closes-starship-inquiry-and-spacex-details-causes-of-november-accidents/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbanffy </名称>; <uri>;https： //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbanffy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/ 2023/11/F_VbEJcbQAAv3Ak-760x380.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;FAA 结束了对 SpaceX 星舰事故的调查，接受了 SpaceX 的根本原因和纠正措施。SpaceX 必须在下次发射前实施更改并获得 FAA 许可证修改。 <a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#spacex-discloses-cause-of-starship-anomalies-as-it-clears-an-faa-hurdle" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39523403" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纯编程语言</stitle>; <id>;https://agraef.github.io/pure-lang/</id>; <更新>;2024 -02-27T19:04:25.853920Z</更新>; <link href="https://agraef.github.io/pure-lang/"/>; <作者>; <name>;tosh</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://agraef.github.io/pure-lang/images /DragonSmall.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Pure 是一种函数式编程语言，具有模式匹配和符号重写等高级功能，使用 LLVM 进行 JIT 编译。它是 Q 的更快后继者，具有广泛的集成选项，并且从 Bitbucket 迁移到GitHub。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pure-programming-language" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=39526922" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;Browserless 的 /unblock API：作为服务躲避机器人检测</stitle>; <id>;https://www.browserless.io/blog/2024/02/26/unblock-api /?apcid=00620de59ffc742367908900&utm_campaign=unblock-api-announcement&utm_content=unblock-api-announcement&utm_medium=email&utm_source=ortto</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T18:04:25.854319Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /www.browserless.io/blog/2024/02/26/unblock-api/?apcid=00620de59ffc742367908900&utm_campaign=unblock-api-announcement&utm_content=unblock-api-announcement&utm_medium=email&utm_source=ortto"/>; <作者>; <名称>;keepamovin< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=keepamovin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.browserless. io/static/f7d167bfab98efe2ec91fa6ca07ccd61/9585e/unblock-API.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了传统机器人屏蔽技术的局限性，并介绍了一个新的 /unblock API，该 API 可以修改 Chrome DevTools 协议层的浏览器行为以避免检测。该 API 允许更人性化的操作例如浏览器大小和设置，减少机器人流量赠品。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-unblock-api-from-browserless-dodging-bot-detection-as-a-service"目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39526797" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Cormac McCarthy 的副业：自由文案编辑</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.millersbookreview.com/p/cormac-mccarthy-sideline-freelance-copy-editor</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T20:04:25.854703Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /www.millersbookreview.com/p/cormac-mccarthy-sideline-freelance-copy-editor"/>; <作者>; <名称>;samclemens</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =samclemens</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https %3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F8bdee67d-a8eb-4671-bd9b-2ae96ca3198f_814x540.jpeg" style="width: 220px;高度：146px;" />;<br />;Cormac McCarthy 独特的极简标点风格，主要使用句点和大写字母，很少有其他标记，影响了他的写作和编辑，包括帮助圣达菲研究所的科学家澄清他们的工作。他的方法反映了他的尊重科学的严谨性和清晰度，从而实现有影响力的合作和出版物。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cormac-mccarthy-s-sideline-freelance-copy-editor" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39518803" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SuperTux</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/SuperTux/supertux</ id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T20:04:25.855470Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/SuperTux/supertux"/>; <作者>; <名称>;floriangosse</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=floriangosse</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a000e64a070a28c3ee44a019e35c1119a01c36ec6a7dbaff62410ddba9f006fb/ 68747470733a2f2f7777772e73757065727475782e6f72672f696d616765732f305f365f302f305f365f305f332e706e67"样式="宽度:220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;SuperTux 是一款受《超级马里奥》启发的平台游戏，玩家引导 Tux 穿越各个世界，从敌人 Nolok 手中拯救 Penny。该游戏是免费的，支持各种控制器，并收到积极的社区贡献。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#supertux" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39528726 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;Blazer：商业智能变得简单</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ankane/blazer</id>; <updated>;2024-02-27T15:04:25.855856Z</updated>; <link href ="https://github.com/ankane/blazer"/>; <作者>; <名称>;tosh</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/783368f9610fcf4b8727603a35c7bbf4ddf9d24ca0deda713fe46eacee8858f4/68747470733a2f2f626c617a65722e646f6b6b756 170702e636f6d2f6173736574732f626c617a65722d6131306261613430666566316361326635626232356663393762636632363161366135343139326662 31616430663839336330663536326238633763343639372e706e67”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 118px;" />;<br />;Blazer提供SQL数据探索、图表/仪表板创建和共享工具，并具有只读用户设置等安全措施以进行查询保护。它支持定期检查调度、用户角色创建和将查询结果链接到外部页面。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#blazer-business-intelligence-made-simple" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39524327" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;处理令人惊讶的人类情绪：办公桌移动（2017）</stitle>; <id>;https://larahogan.me/blog/desk-moves/ </id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T23:04:25.856610Z</更新>; <link href="https://larahogan.me/blog/desk-moves/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;系泊</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://larahogan.me /images/video.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了理解管理中情绪反应的重要性，特别是办公桌移动如何引发归属感和控制等核心需求。它建议管理者应该承认这些反应，并通过强调帮助员工适应全局并提供支持。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dealing-with-surprising- human-emotions-desk-moves-2017" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39531101" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Mountaineer – Python 和 React 中的 Web 应用</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/piercefreeman /mountaineer</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T16:04:25.856987Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/piercefreeman/mountaineer"/>; <作者>; <名称>;icyfox< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=icyfox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent. com/piercefreeman/mountaineer/main/docs/media/ide_typehints.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Mountaineer 是一个注重生产力的框架，用于使用 Python 和 React 构建 Web 应用程序，提供轻松的集成和开发人员工具。它通过提供服务器端渲染、本机 Typescript 支持和自动更新前端状态。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-mountaineer-webapps-in-python-and-react" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39524874" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
